description: "This 1550 map by the German cartographer Sebastian Münster (1488–1552) was based on the work of the 2nd century geographer Ptolemy. There are many inaccuracies, especially in scale and the locations of mountain ranges, but the region is recognisable."
title: "Tabula orientalis regionis, Asiæ scilicet extremas complectens terras & regna"
